name: A Little to No Game - Snack Box
name_original: A Little to No Game - Snack Box
description:
...SPOILER ALERT… WE ARE SERIOUS… 

Our original idea was to create a packing game similar to Unpacking because we love that satisfying feeling of organising things in a specific way. Obviously, we needed to incorporate DECOY into this somehow. If you’ve heard of There is no Game, we attempted to recreate the credit scene game. It begins with the organisation, leading to the credit scene and, because we love our organisation, we end the actual game with the organisation as well. Essentially, the organisation game and the credit scene game act as decoys to each other.
